name: AnimeSwap
description: 1. The token of AnimeSwap protocol, deployed on Aptos Mainnet 2. AnimeSwap protocol is an open AMM & DeFi protocol on Aptos, everyone could create pair and add liquidity, swap, or farm. 3. Deployed on Aptos at Day0 2022/10/19, ANI token launching at 2022/11/10. 4. Deployed on Sui (using Move, the same contract language as Aptos), more collaboration and listings https://docs.animeswap.org/docs/updates/2023 5. Check https://docs.animeswap.org/docs/tutorial/Tokenomics#usages
